data.eml:eml: Monomorium dryhimi sp. n., a new ant species (Hymenoptera, Formicidae) of the M. monomorium group from Saudi Arabia, with a key to the Arabian Monomorium monomorium-group

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Aldawood, Abdulrahman S., Sharaf, Mostafa R. (2011): Monomorium dryhimi sp. n., a new ant species (Hymenoptera, Formicidae) of the M. monomorium group from Saudi Arabia, with a key to the Arabian Monomorium monomorium-group. ZooKeys 106: 47-54, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.106.1390, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.106.1390
